page.title: 12DUTIES IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: My duties consist of a two shift system,0800hrs-1600hrs or 1600hrs-mid.To take a typical 0800hrs-1600hrs duty, my first task would be to book on duty.This is achieved by VHF radio to Police HQ and by telephoning my sub-divisional station at Petersfield who would inform me of urgent calls requiring attention,eg overnight burglary,accident.I would attend these calls by motorcycle and on completion collect any non-urgent enquiries,eg firearms enquiries, summonses warrant,from Petersfield. I would then return to my beat, checking unoccupied houses, perhaps a farm or school visit and general liason with the community. At some time during the day I would try to be at the beat office to deal with any local enquires.
